name: Holiday Inn Express Lincoln City Centre

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is a fairly new hotel and as you'd hope - the rooms are of excellent standard for a mid-range hotel, the breakfast service perfectly acceptable and a good value rate.
reviews.title: Good value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Was slightly disappointed with the car parking charge of £5 considering the hotel is slightly out of the city centre.
reviews.title: One night stay thankfully

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Stayed here for one night on saturday the 9th June 2012 in a twin room breakfast included.
reviews.title: Low cost, High standard

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I only stayed here as I couldn't get into the Premier Inn otherwise I would not have gone near it due to the parking fee.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel, fantastic value.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Most has been said already in other reviews but just to add my bit.
reviews.title: Good location, affordable and clean.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Location, easy to find just across the river from city centre set off a roundabout the car park being at the rear of the hotel. althougth not in centre of Lincoln only a 5 or 10 minute walk across bridge.
reviews.title: Good Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012
reviews.text: Check in was quick and easy staff polite and friendly.
reviews.title: Soiled bed sheets

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled on business
reviews.text: Room we got allocated was clean and large enough for the two days we were staying, modern in style the beds comfortable usual storage, air con and the bathroom was quite nice the hotel appears fairly new.
reviews.title: Noisy room, no hot water, patronising staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled with family
reviews.text: The breakfast was good and well presented a mix between continental and english with some hot items, but good as it was included in price, again staff were helpful the breakfast modern and clean.
reviews.title: City Centre Location in Lincoln

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: There is a supermarket a few minutes walk from the hotel for anything you may need, a retail park opposite and fast food outlets nearby.
reviews.title: Very decent hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hopefully they don't keep putting the prices up, as currently it's very good value for a top notch, quality hotel. If I am to spend a night in a hotel in my home town, this is the place I go. Easy to find and lots around it. If you're going to be out in town, and need a place to stay, this is the place for you. Plus I like a bar that is open all hours, that gives it that special edge over other hotels.
reviews.title: Been 4 times and counting

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here on a Saturday night.
reviews.title: Fab, Couldnt Fault It

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is clean, modern and great value for money. Bedrooms are really impressive. Bar area and complimentary breakfast is great.
reviews.title: Highly recommend, luxury at a reasonable price!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had plenty to do around the hotel, cinema, nandos and other similar restaurant chains just over the road and Lincoln about 15 mins walk away if that.
reviews.title: What a nice hotel!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled on business
reviews.text: Defo recommended.
reviews.title: Well above average for a budget hotel!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Me and girlfriend stayed here for my friends wedding. The hotel is quiet lovely, the staff super friendly and helpful. The room was lovely. Couldn't really find anything to fault except no bacon for breakfast lol, knit picking now I know. Special thanks to Robyn who really went out of her was for us.
reviews.title: Great hotel.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled with family
reviews.text: Stayed for a second time in recent months and again found this hotel to be clean and welcoming - despite it being fully booked [for the nearby Waddington Airshow by the look of it] the staff were friendly and efficient. Breakfast was well stocked and the breakfast room kept clean and tidy.
reviews.title: Friendly, efficient and good value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011
reviews.text: Stayed here for a night after a shopping trip.was spot on good location nice rooms and friendly staff.
reviews.title: nice hotel.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just had three nights at this hotel..very nice spacious room,spotlessly clean..Very nice friendly staff..Well located for the city centre and Cathedral..Plenty of restaurants nearby...Only fault was the £5 per night parking fee,although it was a secure car park on the hotel site.
reviews.title: Good location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here for 1 night in May. The reception staff were very friendly, our room was very clean and comfortable and it is nice to have a choice of pillows, I like firm and my husband soft so we were both happy. the breakfast is more than acceptable, enough to get you going for the day. The hotel is close enough that you can walk across the bridge to the restaurant strip by the water, there is a variety of menus, something for everyone.
reviews.title: Good location

aka: Holiday Inn Express Lincoln City Centre Hotel Lincoln
description: Choose the sleek Holiday Inn Express Lincoln City Centre hotel for contemporary comfort in the heart of Lincoln's business district. It's a short trip from Holiday Inn Express Lincoln City Centre to Lincolnshire Showground for your event or conference. Afterwards, you can catch up with colleagues over a drink or meal in our vibrant Lobby or dine out at the numerous restaurants on nearby Lincoln High Street. Or head back to your air-conditioned Guest room where free Wi-Fi allows you to work at your desk in peace and quiet. We're a 5-mile drive from Lincolnshire Showground, and 40 miles from East Midlands Airport. Drivers can relax as there's plenty of secure parking at our hotel. Invite colleagues to meet in our naturally lit meeting room. Or work via complimentary WiFi in the hotel's striking aubergine and cream toned public areas.Set just behind Lincoln High Street, the Holiday Inn Express Lincoln City Centre puts brand-name shopping and trendy restaurants right on your doorstep. It's a pleasant 15-minute stroll to Lincoln University and the craft shops of the cobbled Cathedral Quarter. An enticing selection of bars makes buzzing Brayford waterfront a good choice for your night out. Kick-start your day with our complimentary continental breakfast with hot items. Spend evenings relaxing with friends over drinks in the Holiday Inn Express Lincoln City Centre's stylish Great Room. Wi-Fi is free for guests who book directly with the hotel.
